accommodation.name: Harbin Wei Ye Hotel
accommodation.location: 32 Jihong Street, Daoli District, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province
accommodation.notes: Excellent location in the heart of Harbin near Orthodox Church ruins and Zhongyang Street. 5 minutes walk to Ice and Snow World area. Safe neighborhood with easy access to Russian architecture district. Highly rated 4.5/5 by travelers.
accommodation.location_base: 32 Jihong Street, Daoli District, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province
accommodation.location_local: 32 Jihong Street, Daoli District, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province
accommodation.notes_local: 位于哈尔滨市中心，靠近东正教堂遗址和中央大街。步行5分钟即达冰雪大世界区域。安全社区，可方便前往俄式建筑区。旅客评分4.5/5。
accommodation.notes_base: Excellent location in the heart of Harbin near Orthodox Church ruins and Zhongyang Street. 5 minutes walk to Ice and Snow World area. Safe neighborhood with easy access to Russian architecture district. Highly rated 4.5/5 by travelers.

accommodation.name: Kind Hotel Tianjin
accommodation.location: 15 Ziyou Avenue, Italian Style Street, Hebei District, Tianjin
accommodation.notes: Perfect location directly on Italian Style Street. Walking distance to Tianjin Eye (3km), Ancient Culture Street, and Five Great Avenues. Excellent 5/5 rating. Quiet and well-maintained property.

accommodation.notes_local: 位于意式风情街上的绝佳位置。步行可达天津之眼（3公里）、古文化街和五大道。评分5/5。安静、维护良好。
accommodation.notes_base: Perfect location directly on Italian Style Street. Walking distance to Tianjin Eye (3km), Ancient Culture Street, and Five Great Avenues. Excellent 5/5 rating. Quiet and well-maintained property.

accommodation.name: Moxy Xi'an Downtown
accommodation.location: 282 Xiyi Road, Xincheng District, Xi'an, Shaanxi Province
accommodation.notes: Modern boutique hotel near Bell Tower and Muslim Quarter. 5-minute walk to Zhonglou metro station. Exceptional 4.8/5 rating with praised service. Free laundry room with washing machines and dryer. Perfect for solo travelers. Near night markets.
accommodation.location_base: 282 Xiyi Road, Xincheng District, Xi'an, Shaanxi Province
accommodation.location_local: 282 Xiyi Road, Xincheng District, Xi'an, Shaanxi Province
accommodation.notes_local: 位于钟楼和回民街附近的现代精品酒店。步行5分钟可达钟楼地铁站。评分4.8/5，服务获赞。免费洗衣房配有洗衣机和烘干机。适合独行旅客。靠近夜市。

accommodation.name: Scholars Hotel PingJiangFu Suzhou
accommodation.location: 60 Baita East Road, Gusu District, Suzhou, Jiangsu Province
accommodation.notes: Beautiful traditional-style hotel near Pingjiang Road ancient street and canal. 3 minutes walk to Humble Administrator's Garden. Next to shopping area with picturesque canal views. Excellent location for Suzhou Museum visits. Rated 4.4/5.
accommodation.name_local: 苏州平江府书香世家酒店
accommodation.location_base: 60 Baita East Road, Gusu District, Suzhou, Jiangsu Province

accommodation.notes_local: 靠近平江路古街和运河的中式传统风格酒店。步行3分钟到拙政园。旁边是购物区，运河景色如画。参观苏州博物馆的绝佳位置。评分4.4/5。
accommodation.notes_base: Beautiful traditional-style hotel near Pingjiang Road ancient street and canal. 3 minutes walk to Humble Administrator's Garden. Next to shopping area with picturesque canal views. Excellent location for Suzhou Museum visits. Rated 4.4/5.

accommodation.name: Hangzhou West Lake Hubin Yintai Atour Hotel
accommodation.location: Jingjin Mansion, 228 Zhonghe Middle Road, Shangcheng District, Hangzhou
accommodation.notes: Popular location near West Lake scenic area. 20-minute walk to Hubin Yintai and West Lake waterfront. Excellent breakfast service. Great base for visiting Lingyin Temple and Longjing Tea Village. Rated 4.7/5. Modern facilities.
accommodation.name_base: Hangzhou West Lake Hubin Yintai Atour Hotel

accommodation.name: Holiday Inn Express Guilin City Center
accommodation.location: 30 Yiren Road, Xiufeng District, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.notes: Excellent central location next to main food and shopping areas. Right across from People's Square. 5-minute walk to Li River departure point. Free self-service laundry on breakfast floor. Spacious rooms. Rated 4.4/5. Perfect for early Li River cruise departure.
accommodation.name_base: Holiday Inn Express Guilin City Center
accommodation.name_local: 桂林市中心智选假日酒店
accommodation.location_base: 30 Yiren Road, Xiufeng District, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.location_local: 30 Yiren Road, Xiufeng District, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.notes_local: 位于主要美食和购物区旁的绝佳中心位置。正对人民广场。步行5分钟到漓江出发点。早餐楼层设有免费自助洗衣房。房间宽敞。评分4.4/5。适合早起出发漓江游船。
accommodation.notes_base: Excellent central location next to main food and shopping areas. Right across from People's Square. 5-minute walk to Li River departure point. Free self-service laundry on breakfast floor. Spacious rooms. Rated 4.4/5. Perfect for early Li River cruise departure.

accommodation.name: The Bamboo Leaf Yangshuo
accommodation.location: 48 Shibanqiao Village, Yangshuo County, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.notes: Peaceful resort setting 8 minutes walk from Li River cruise drop-off point. 20-minute walk or short cycle to Yangshuo town and West Street. Swimming pool and excellent restaurant. Very helpful English-speaking staff. Free bike rental for Ten-Mile Gallery. Rated 4.7/5. Perfect for Yulong River rafting base.
accommodation.location_base: 48 Shibanqiao Village, Yangshuo County, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.location_local: 48 Shibanqiao Village, Yangshuo County, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.notes_local: 距漓江游船下船点步行8分钟的宁静度假酒店。步行20分钟或骑行可达阳朔镇和西街。游泳池和优秀餐厅。英语服务员非常热心。免费自行车可骑行十里画廊。评分4.7/5。遇龙河漂流的理想基地。

accommodation.name: Hilton Garden Inn Zhangjiajie Wulingyuan
accommodation.location: 108 Baofeng Road, Wulingyuan District, Zhangjiajie, Hunan Province
accommodation.notes: Brand new hotel opened in 2025 in quiet Wulingyuan area near National Forest Park entrance. Exceptional service with helpful staff arranging park tickets and transportation. Excellent breakfast. Huge spacious rooms. Free laundry machines. Perfect location for Avatar Hallelujah Mountain and Tianzi Mountain cable car. Rated 4.7/5.
accommodation.name_local: 张家界武陵源希尔顿花园酒店
accommodation.location_base: 108 Baofeng Road, Wulingyuan District, Zhangjiajie, Hunan Province
accommodation.location_local: 108 Baofeng Road, Wulingyuan District, Zhangjiajie, Hunan Province
accommodation.notes_local: 2025年新开业酒店，位于武陵源区靠近国家森林公园入口。服务出色，工作人员可帮忙安排门票和交通。早餐优秀。房间超大宽敞。免费洗衣机。游览阿凡达哈利路亚山和天子山缆车的理想位置。评分4.7/5。

Excellent breakfast. Huge spacious rooms. Free laundry machines. Perfect location for Avatar Hallelujah Mountain and Tianzi Mountain cable car. Rated 4.7/5.

accommodation.name: ARTHUR HOTEL CANTON TOWER GUANGZHOU
accommodation.location: 375 Xingang Middle Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province
accommodation.notes: Excellent location one metro stop from Canton Tower. Very close to Kecun metro station (Exit B). Walking distance to Canton Tower and Pearl River. Modern facilities with helpful front desk. Highly rated 4.5/5. Perfect for exploring Shamian Island and Chen Clan Ancestral Hall before high-speed train to Shenzhen.
accommodation.location_base: 375 Xingang Middle Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province
accommodation.location_local: 375 Xingang Middle Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province
accommodation.notes_local: 距广州塔一站地铁的绝佳位置。非常靠近客村地铁站（B出口）。步行可达广州塔和珠江。设施现代，前台服务热情。评分4.5/5。适合前往沙面岛和陈家祠后乘高铁去深圳。

accommodation.name: Hyatt Place Shenzhen Dongmen
accommodation.location: 3018 Jianshe Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, Guangdong Province
accommodation.notes: Huge rooms with king bed and living area. Less than 100m from Laojie metro station (Exit H). Located in/beside 1234Space shopping mall at Dongmen Pedestrian Street. Perfect location for crossing to Hong Kong at Luohu Port (2 metro stops). Daily breakfast included. Rated 4.3/5.
accommodation.name_local: 深圳东门凯悦嘉轩酒店
accommodation.location_base: 3018 Jianshe Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, Guangdong Province
accommodation.location_local: 3018 Jianshe Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, Guangdong Province
accommodation.notes_local: 超大房间配大床和客厅区域。距老街地铁站（H出口）不到100米。位于东门步行街1234Space购物中心内。罗湖口岸过关去香港仅两站地铁。含每日早餐。评分4.3/5。

Perfect location for crossing to Hong Kong at Luohu Port (2 metro stops). Daily breakfast included. Rated 4.3/5.

accommodation.name: Holiday Inn Golden Mile Hong Kong
accommodation.location: 50 Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
accommodation.notes: Prime location directly at Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (N5 exit). Walking distance to Victoria Peak tram, Star Ferry, and Temple Street Night Market. Heart of Tsim Sha Tsui shopping district. Convenient for day trip to Lantau Island (Tian Tan Buddha) and ferry to Macau. Rated 4.1/5. Request renovated room if available.
accommodation.name_base: Holiday Inn Golden Mile Hong Kong
accommodation.location_base: 50 Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
accommodation.location_local: 50 Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
accommodation.notes_local: 位于尖沙咀港铁站（N5出口）的黄金地段。步行可达山顶缆车、天星小轮和庙街夜市。尖沙咀购物区中心。方便一日游前往大屿山（天坛大佛）和乘船去澳门。评分4.1/5。如有翻新房间建议预订。
accommodation.notes_base: Prime location directly at Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (N5 exit). Walking distance to Victoria Peak tram, Star Ferry, and Temple Street Night Market. Heart of Tsim Sha Tsui shopping district. Convenient for day trip to Lantau Island (Tian Tan Buddha) and ferry to Macau. Rated 4.1/5. Request renovated room if available.

notes: All accommodations selected for mid-to-high range quality with excellent locations for planned activities. Pricing is per night in CNY for mainland China locations and HKD for Hong Kong (converted to CNY equivalent for display). Total accommodation cost for 13 nights: approximately CNY 6,350 (€800). Hotels chosen based on: proximity to attractions, safety, English-speaking staff where available, and high guest ratings (4.0+/5). For Hong Kong, note that prices are significantly higher due to location premium. All hotels can be booked via major booking platforms (Booking.com, Trip.com, Agoda) or directly. Advance booking recommended, especially for Harbin (winter season) and Zhangjiajie (popular park area).
